title: Similar font
content:
Hi folks,

I was wondering if anyone can recommend a font similar to this: [http://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Bree+Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020532/http:/www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Bree+Serif "http://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Bree+Serif")

I am using the above font for a website and wanted something for print in more weights.

Thanks
author: reboot

comments.content:
Typetogether is about to release the whole family.  
 [http://www.type-together.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020532/http:/www.type-together.com/ "http://www.type-together.com/")

Yes, get the real thing.

hhp

Some I like for the time being: [Adelle](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020532/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/type-together/adelle) and [Crete](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020532/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/type-together/crete) (same foundry), [Prelo Slab](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020532/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/prelo-slab), [Rooney](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020532/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Rooney) (my vote), [Korpo Serif Alternate](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020532/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/borutta/korpo-serif), [Vista Slab Alternate](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020532/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/vista-slab-ot), [Directa Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020532/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/outras/directa-serif), [Manual Slab](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020532/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/primetype/manual-slab), [Dancer Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020532/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontpartners/fp-dancer-serif), [Vecta Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020532/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/wilton/vecta-serif), [Fiona Slab](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020532/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/brassfonts/fiona-slab), [Cyntho Slab](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820020532/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/konstantynov/cyntho-slab-pro)
